5.title: Episode #8.5
5.plot: This is a series of bloopers and outtakes from season 8 of Sprockets and Splices. Fun and enjoyable.

1.title: Deus Ludio/The Nightmare/Adventures of Shirley
1.plot: Deus Ludio: You wake up and you get to choose life or death. The Nightmare: Suspenseful and scary "what if". Adventures of Shirley: A new House Guest and the adventures of same.

2.plot: Adventures with Nigel: A "Travelog" comedy. The Aquarium: A "Cultural Awareness" animation. Emergency: A "Commentary" on today's society. 911 call and trouble with the operator.

4.plot: Lights Out: a "short and cute animation". Forgotten Melody: A hard hitting 'gangster' short. Nigel Woolcock's Travels to the Orient: A "travelog" comedy.

6.title: In Zakk's Case/Body of Work
6.plot: In Zakk's Case: What happens if you know how many lives you have? Body of Work: A macabre look at "Art".

8.plot: One Over: comedy about a checkout line at a grocery store. Second Sight: Modern miracle? Balance: What now? Good vs Evil.

1.title: One Hour Special
1.plot: One Hour Special featured the short film When Bart Meets Lulu about two older people looking for love via new technology; two animated short films; The Escape and Gypsies; Scarfeet about a plastic surgeon that uses only his feet and Third Shift about a Vampire that doesn't want to be a vampire and works at a convenience store.

imdb.title: Sprockets & Splices
plot: Sprockets and Splices is a forum for Independent film makers to have their short films seen on National Broadcast TV. Each episode is hosted by a beautiful amateur model; The Splice Girls.::Joel Stephens
